brokerProfiles.companyOverview:
Our team is the definitive resource in the logistics space. With decades of combined experience working in and with logistics operations and e-commerce investments, our team and industry experts can help you learn how to identify and run route-based operations efficiently to maximize your profits.

Headquartered in Nashville, TN, Route Consultant offers extensive consulting services to new and experienced route owners. These services include business valuations, operations/fleet management optimization, route efficiency analysis, and more.

We operate as route brokers, maintaining an exclusive listing of routes for sale across the United States. We give each of our route sellers access to a deep pool of qualified and educated buyers.
brokerProfiles.introduction:
Route Consultant is not endorsed by and is not recommended by Federal Express Corporation and FedEx Ground. Route Consultant is not sponsored by, is not approved by, is not associated with, and has no connection whatsoever with Federal Express Corporation or FedEx Ground.

Route Consultant is not affiliated with Amazon and its Delivery Service Partner program and none of the content we share through our program has been validated or approved by the company. Additionally, the vendor partners that we work with are not approved Valued Added Services through the DSP program. It is your responsibility to ensure your work with our organization meets the terms of Amazon’s Program Agreement and Ownership Transfer Policy.
brokerProfiles.services: Route Consultant offers a host of services apart from our core brokerage services, including buyer side consulting for new investors and profitability consulting for current contractors. More than anything, we offer free education and community-building to our network of contractors. A rising tide lifts all boats!
brokerProfiles.tagline: Partner with a former contracting organization.

brokerProfiles.companyOverview:
When you are in need to BUY, SELL or AUCTION a property or business, Jennifer Swerdlick is the best choice in CT because of her 29 yrs of experience owning businesses, buying properties and selling real estate. Her specialized knowledge of Restaurants gives her the expertise to value the assets and sell timely in the manner you choose.
Jennifer Swerdlick is co-owner of Restaurant Equipment Paradise Inc. and VIce President  Paradise buys used, sells new & used and  designs restaurants all over CT & New England.  It can accommodate National Restaurant Projects.  Restaurant Equipment Paradise is celebrating 20 years and proud to have a reliable Team of 22 to uphold reputation and continue to grow as well as improve. 

Jennifer Swerdlick also works with Fine and Company which is a full service national real estate auction and advisory services company. She is head of Business Development in CT.  Michael A. Fine is Broker and Head of the corporate office in Deerfield, IL.  Fine and Company is strategically positioned across the USA in various markets.  Whether it is a college campus, boy scout camp, coal mine, retail building or a mansion in the mountains, he and his team can custom market an advertising  plan to achieve the property's market value. This is how they move a property to a non distressed category. The auction method is an acceleration of the sale in the timeframe the seller decides to make.
brokerProfiles.introduction:
Since 1999, Jennifer Swerdlick has been buying and selling restaurant equipment, businesses and property.  Otherwise known as Paradise Jen, she began auctioning restaurants in 2006.  After over 400 Paradise Auctions, she can claim to be a specialist on valuing restaurants assets. Choose Jennifer Swerdlick for all your endeavors in making the right decision when buying, selling or creating a new restaurant.  When you are thinking of retirement, plan ahead with Jen.

Phone advice is free and confidential 860-280-8610.

brokerProfiles.companyOverview: RCG was started 20 years ago by founder and CEO, Eric W. Voide.  A native of CT, Eric realized early success in buying and selling businesses.  After structuring a huge real estate acquisition deal while working for a private equity firm in NYC, Eric took his buy out and RCG was born.  Continuing a tradition of representing business principals the way we would want to be represented, RCG does not collect arbitrary fees or mass listings just to appear busy.  In fact, we are very selective about the businesses we select for representation.  RCG is different.... we don't compete in any category, we create our own category!
brokerProfiles.introduction: The Rivo Consulting Group is a collection of talented and specialized business professionals, dedicated to helping our clients realize maximum returns.  We are LOCAL, independently owned and not a national "chain" or phony "coaching" franchise.

At RPG, we specialize in connecting serious buyers with quality heavy equipment and businesses in the material processing, construction, and earthmoving industries. From grinders, crushers, and screeners to complete operations, our focus is on helping clients navigate transactions with confidence, clarity, and speed.
With deep industry knowledge and a nationwide network, we understand that every deal is more than just numbers—it’s about timing, trust, and finding the right fit. Whether you’re looking to sell a single machine, liquidate a fleet, or transition out of a business, we position your asset in front of qualified buyers who are ready to move.
Our brokerage process is straightforward and transparent. We start with a detailed evaluation, provide market-driven pricing guidance, and create targeted outreach strategies to maximize exposure. We handle the marketing, inquiries, negotiations, and closing details so you can focus on your next step. For buyers, we actively source equipment and business opportunities based on your exact needs, often tapping into off-market deals not listed anywhere else.
What sets us apart is our ability to move quickly while maintaining the personal, relationship-driven service our clients value. We know the industry inside and out—how machines are built, what they’re worth in today’s market, and where the demand is strongest. That expertise helps us close deals faster and secure better results for both buyers and sellers.
If you’re ready to sell, buy, or explore your options, we’ll put our network, experience, and hustle to work for you.
value.brokerIntroduction:
I’m Ryan, a business and equipment broker with a passion for connecting the right buyers and sellers in the dirt world. With years of hands-on experience in the heavy equipment and material processing industries, I know how to evaluate assets, navigate negotiations, and get deals closed.
Before launching my brokerage, I worked directly in the field—buying, selling, and running equipment—so I understand the real-world demands my clients face. Today, I combine that firsthand knowledge with a broad national network to help clients sell faster, buy smarter, and avoid costly mistakes.
My approach is simple: listen first, move quickly, and keep communication clear at every step. Whether you’re selling a single machine, an entire fleet, or a full business, I’ll bring market insight, targeted outreach, and the hustle needed to make your transaction a success.
If you’re ready to take the next step—whether buying, selling, or just exploring your options—I’d be glad to talk.

item.name: Ryan Cullen
item.description:
I’m Ryan, a business and equipment broker with a passion for connecting the right buyers and sellers in the dirt world. With years of hands-on experience in the heavy equipment and material processing industries, I know how to evaluate assets, navigate negotiations, and get deals closed.
Before launching my brokerage, I worked directly in the field—buying, selling, and running equipment—so I understand the real-world demands my clients face. Today, I combine that firsthand knowledge with a broad national network to help clients sell faster, buy smarter, and avoid costly mistakes.
My approach is simple: listen first, move quickly, and keep communication clear at every step. Whether you’re selling a single machine, an entire fleet, or a full business, I’ll bring market insight, targeted outreach, and the hustle needed to make your transaction a success.
If you’re ready to take the next step—whether buying, selling, or just exploring your options—I’d be glad to talk.

worksFor.name: RPG Equipment
worksFor.description:
At RPG, we specialize in connecting serious buyers with quality heavy equipment and businesses in the material processing, construction, and earthmoving industries. From grinders, crushers, and screeners to complete operations, our focus is on helping clients navigate transactions with confidence, clarity, and speed.
With deep industry knowledge and a nationwide network, we understand that every deal is more than just numbers—it’s about timing, trust, and finding the right fit. Whether you’re looking to sell a single machine, liquidate a fleet, or transition out of a business, we position your asset in front of qualified buyers who are ready to move.
Our brokerage process is straightforward and transparent. We start with a detailed evaluation, provide market-driven pricing guidance, and create targeted outreach strategies to maximize exposure. We handle the marketing, inquiries, negotiations, and closing details so you can focus on your next step. For buyers, we actively source equipment and business opportunities based on your exact needs, often tapping into off-market deals not listed anywhere else.
What sets us apart is our ability to move quickly while maintaining the personal, relationship-driven service our clients value. We know the industry inside and out—how machines are built, what they’re worth in today’s market, and where the demand is strongest. That expertise helps us close deals faster and secure better results for both buyers and sellers.
If you’re ready to sell, buy, or explore your options, we’ll put our network, experience, and hustle to work for you.
